description: CodeBRT, a all-in-one AI assistant for developers
config.title: CodeBRT
config.language.description: Set the language for CodeBRT extension
config.groqApiKey.markdownDescription: API key for Open Source LLM model
config.themeAlgorithm.markdownDescriptio: The algorithm to use for the theme. The `darkAlgorithm` is a dark theme with a dark background and light text. The `defaultAlgorithm` is a light theme with a light background and dark text. The `compactAlgorithm` is a compact theme with a dark background and light text.
config.themeBorderRadius.markdownDescrip: The border radius for the theme. The default value is 4.
config.hljsTheme.markdownDescription: The theme to use for syntax highlighting. The default value is `darcula`.
config.lastUsedHistoryID.markdownDescrip: The ID of the last used history.
config.doubleEnterSendMessages.descripti: Double enter to send messages for preventing accidental sending
config.doubleEnterSendMessages.markdownD: Whether to use double enter to send messages for preventing accidental sending.
